TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DocumentAnalysisClient extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The client to use to connect to the Form Recognizer Azure Cognitive Service to analyze information from documents and images and extract it into structured data. It provides the ability to use prebuilt models to analyze receipts, business cards, invoices, to extract document content, and more. It's also possible to extract fields from custom documents with models built on custom document types.
Docs.remarks: Client is only available for and higher. If you want to use a lower version, please use the .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Azure.AI.FormRecognizer.DocumentAnalysis.AnalyzeDocumentOperation StartAnalyzeDocument (string modelId, System.IO.Stream document, Azure.AI.FormRecognizer.DocumentAnalysis.AnalyzeDocumentOptions analyzeDocumentOptions = default, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Azure.AI.FormRecognizer.DocumentAnalysis.AnalyzeDocumentOperation StartAnalyzeDocument(string modelId, class System.IO.Stream document, class Azure.AI.FormRecognizer.DocumentAnalysis.AnalyzeDocumentOptions analyzeDocumentOptions, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

Public Overridable Function StartAnalyzeDocument (modelId As String, document As Stream, Optional analyzeDocumentOptions As AnalyzeDocumentOptions = Nothing, Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As AnalyzeDocumentOperation

abstract member StartAnalyzeDocument : string * System.IO.Stream * Azure.AI.FormRecognizer.DocumentAnalysis.AnalyzeDocumentOptions * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> Azure.AI.FormRecognizer.DocumentAnalysis.AnalyzeDocumentOperation override this.StartAnalyzeDocument : string * System.IO.Stream * Azure.AI.FormRecognizer.DocumentAnalysis.AnalyzeDocumentOptions * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> Azure.AI.FormRecognizer.DocumentAnalysis.AnalyzeDocumentOperation

Docs.param: The ID of the model to use for analyzing the input documents. When using a custom built model for analysis, this parameter must be the ID attributed to the model during its creation. When using one of the service's prebuilt models, one of the supported prebuilt model IDs must be passed. Prebuilt model IDs can be found at .
The stream containing one or more documents to analyze.
A set of options available for configuring the analyze request. For example, specify the locale of the document, or which pages to analyze.
A controlling the request lifetime.
Docs.summary: Analyzes pages from one or more documents, using a model built with custom forms or one of the prebuilt models provided by the Form Recognizer service.
Docs.returns: An to wait on this long-running operation. Its upon successful completion will contain analyzed pages from the input document.
